STM: Felt overwhelmed by the demands of college classes, particularly in Comp Sci and coding assignments.
Questioned the relevance of some coursework to his future career.
MTM: Adjusted to college life and academic expectations, building foundational skills in technology and finance.
Started to explore career paths through networking with peers and professors.
LTM: Transitioned from high school to college, choosing a path in technology and finance.

short_term.goal: Attend career fairs and networking events at NYU
Complete a project involving blockchain or Web3 to showcase on his resume

long_term: Gain internships or entry-level positions in blockchain or Web3 companies.
Develop a strong reputation in the tech and finance community through contributions to open-source projects or publications.

plot_points.description: Xavier's struggle with coding assignments might lead him to seek mentorship or online resources to improve his skills.

STM: Felt isolated in college, missing high school friends and struggling with the social aspect of college life.
Formed initial connections with classmates but also experienced social anxieties and awkwardness.
MTM: Explored the social scene in NYC, from attending events to making friends in class.
Navigated the complexities of dorm life, adjusting to shared living spaces and diverse personalities.
LTM: Left the comfort of home to explore independence and form new relationships in college.

short_term.goal: Join a student club or group related to his interests
Plan a small gathering or outing with new friends

long_term: Build a supportive network of friends and professional contacts.
Develop deeper, meaningful relationships while balancing personal growth.

plot_points.description: Xavier might reflect on the value of genuine connections versus the superficial interactions often found in college social settings.

LTM: Establishing routines to maintain physical and mental health amidst the transition to college life.

Explore campus fitness facilities and participate in one group fitness class

long_term: Achieve a balanced lifestyle with regular exercise, healthy eating, and stress management techniques.
Develop a sustainable approach to well-being that supports his academic and career ambitions.

Expressed concerns about being broke despite being in college.

Explored student discounts and budget-friendly activities.
LTM: Transitioned from financial dependence on parents to managing personal finances.

long_term: Achieve financial independence through savings, investments, and career progression.
